item.title: Beginning the Journey
item.description: So it has been an age and a day since I last entered the blogosphere. It’s been something I’ve been mulling over for a few years now, but something I never did commit to due to one excuse or another that I made up along the way. I was content just being … or at least pretending like I was. Content, that is. One can’t help ‘being’. It is a requirement of life, really.
